RTCCodecStatsMimeType.summary: The mimeType property of the dictionary is a string containing the codec's {{glossary("MIME type")}} and subtype.

remarks.para: This is of the form "type/subtype", such as "video/VP8" or "audio/opus", as defined in the IANA registry of valid MIME types.

-codecs.mimeType option in parameter passed to RTCRtpTransceiver.setCodecPreferences() and RTCRtpSender.setParameters().
-codecs.mimeType in object returned by RTCRtpSender.getParameters() and RTCRtpReceiver.getParameters().

RTCCodecStatsMimeType.value: A string indicating the code MIME type/subtype.
